title: Twitter : number of monetizable daily active U.S. users 2017 to 2019
yAxis: Number of monetizable daily active users in millions
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of monetizable daily active users in millions for 12 number of Quarters.
The Number of monetizable daily active users in millions is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q4 '17.
There is a difference of 6.0 between the maximum Quarter Q4 '19 and minimum Quarter Q4 '17.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Number of monetizable daily active users in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Number of monetizable daily active users in millions 31.0 is found at Quarter Q4 '19 and the minimum is found at Q4 '17 where Quarter is 25.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of monetizable daily active users in millions for 12 number of Quarters.
The Number of monetizable daily active users in millions is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q4 '17.
The difference of Number of monetizable daily active users in millions between the highest and lowest Quarter is 6.0.
Number of monetizable daily active users in millions at Quarter Q4 '19 is 31.0 , second place is  at 31.0, and thirdly is Q2 '19 at 29.0.
The Number of monetizable daily active users in millions has decreased over the past 12 Quarters.
Quarter Q3 '18, Q2 '18, Q1 '18, Q3 '17, and Q1 '17 have a similar Number of monetizable daily active users in millions that is 26.0.
The Quarter Q4 '17 tends to be 1.14 percent lower than average.
The Number of monetizable daily active users in millions is 325.0 if we add up values of all Quarters.
